title: Functional Values Table
text: The functional values are shown in the table. Note: the values in this table were obtained using a calculator and using all the places given in the calculator output.\n##figure1.gif##

title: The Approaching Limit
text: As we read down the $$\frac{1}{x}$$ columns, does $$lim_x$$ → 0**- $$\frac{1}{x}$$ and $$lim_x$$ → 0**+ $$\frac{1}{x}$$ approach the same values?

title: Finding $$lim_x$$ → $$0$$ $$\frac{1}{x}$$
text: Since $$lim_x$$ → 0**- $$\frac{1}{x}$$ $$=$$ $$-\infty$$ and $$lim_x$$ → 0**+ $$\frac{1}{x}$$ $$=$$ $$+\infty$$ have different values, we conclude that $$lim_x$$ → $$0$$ $$\frac{1}{x}$$ DNE. The graph of f(x) $$=$$ $$\frac{1}{x}$$ in the figure confirms these conclusions.\n##figure2.gif##
